venue_description: The TerraNova Equestrian Center in Myakka City, Florida features six all‑weather arenas with top‑notch footing, a VIP pavilion and elevated viewing areas. The site was designed to honor the natural beauty of the oak‑lined property and hosts competitions for horses and riders of all levels, reflecting core tenets of purity of sport, harmony with nature and commitment to excellencehttps://www.theestatesatterranova.com/about-terranova#:~:text=,all%20levels%20of%20equestrian%20competition.

Prioritize tight ring windows, early schooling, late features, and parking for trucks/trailers.","Tone":"Practical, insider, authoritative. Use real A-circuit phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, drags, splits). No fluff.","Buckets":[{"label":"–$$$","description":"Practical/groom-friendly within ~20–25 min; easy surface lots; walkable food."},{"label":"$$$$","description":"Owner-trainer/boutique up to ~35 min; quiet, reliable service; valet/self-park clarity."}],"Must_have_amenities_any":["reliable Wi-Fi","late check-in","early coffee or breakfast","laundry access (in-house or nearby)","truck/trailer-friendly or large surface lot"],"Hard_excludes":["Motel 6","Red Roof Inn","Econo Lodge","Super 8","Rodeway Inn","weekly-rate motels","properties with persistent safety complaints"],"Safety emphasis":["well-lit parking","quiet rooms (away from nightlife)","walkable dining for grooms"],"Name_parsing":"If brand + locality (e.g., 'Hilton Garden Inn Ocala Downtown'), set hotel_name='Hilton Garden Inn', name2='Ocala Downtown'. If generic (e.g., 'Equus Inn Ocala'), set hotel_name='Equus Inn', name2='Ocala'.\",\"Chain_parsing\": \"If chain provided like 'Hilton (Hilton Garden Inn)', set chain='Hilton', chain2='Hilton Garden Inn'. Else chain='Independent', chain2='Independent'.","Amenity_normalization":"Return amenities as a semicolon-separated string OR array; prefer concise, rider-useful items (early breakfast, laundry, parking notes).","Safety_notes_style":"One sentence, concrete location/policy guidance (e.g., 'Use garage; avoid street parking with tack.').","Approx_drive_format":"Use ranges like '20–25 min'; reflect typical traffic on US-301/Largo/Bowie corridors.","Flagged budget motel chains to avoid":"Motel 6, Red Roof Inn, Econo Lodge, Super 8, Rodeway Inn.","Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/hotel-curator_example.json","Duplicates":"Deduplicate near-identical listings; prefer the newest/most reliable page.","Minimum required JSON fields":"venue_uid, bucket, name, approx_drive, chain, amenities, safety_notes, url"}]

data-section:
{
  "section_uid": "tec-venue-sec",
  "section_type": "section_profile",
  "section_title": "TerraNova Equestrian Center — Venue Profile",
  "section_overview": "Myakka City’s TerraNova runs like a purpose-built show campus: spacious competition arenas, generous warm-up, and clear lanes from stabling to in-gates so you can cycle trips without missing a gate call. Vendor row sits close to the barns for fast fixes and caffeine runs. Expect organized schooling blocks, tidy tractor drags, and a straightforward jog strip—plan your hack windows and keep a ring bag ready for quick swaps between equitation, derbies, and the GP ring.",
  "section_keywords": [
    "TerraNova Equestrian Center",
    "Myakka City FL horse shows",
    "hunter/jumper",
    "equitation",
    "Grand Prix",
    "derbies",
    "warm-up ring",
    "jog strip",
    "vendor row",
    "stabling",
    "A-circuit"
  ],
  "section_cta_text": "Plan your week at TerraNova",
  "section_img": "https://www.terranovaequestrian.com/wp-content/uploads/terranova-venue.jpg",
  "section_img_alt": "Stadium arena, warm-up, and stabling at TerraNova Equestrian Center in Myakka City, Florida",
  "section_link": "https://www.terranovaequestrian.com/",
  "section_meta_description": "Insider venue profile for TerraNova Equestrian Center: warm-up flow, jog strip basics, vendor row access, and stabling tips tailored to A-circuit hunter/jumper riders.",
  "section_open_graph_title": "TerraNova Equestrian Center — Venue Guide for A-Circuit Riders",
  "section_open_graph_description": "Upbeat, practical notes on warm-up rings, the jog strip, vendor row, and stabling so you can move efficiently between trips at TerraNova.",
  "section_search_title": "TerraNova Equestrian Center Venue Profile",
  "section_search_description": "Authoritative, rider-focused overview of TerraNova with warm-up, jog strip, vendor row, and stabling tips for hunters, jumpers, and equitation.",
  "section_spotlight": {
    "title": "Quick Hits for Show Week",
    "bullets": [
      "Warm-up ring: call your lines early; pass left-to-left; flat during off-peak to avoid in-gate compression before big eq and derby trips.",
      "Jog strip: arrive polished and five minutes early; number visible; keep a rag for last-second boot wipe and a spare stick in the ring bag.",
      "Vendor row: close to stabling—phone ahead for studs, spur straps, or braiding yarn; stash tape, a hole punch, and extra keepers.",
      "Stabling: aisles stay active—trunks flush, hoses coiled; fans secured; lunging only in designated spaces to keep traffic moving.",
      "Footing & drags: expect efficient drags; confirm schooling windows with the in-gate if weather pops up—pack a cooler and a rain sheet.",
      "Logistics: golf carts share lanes with lead-ins—slow at pinch points; allow a few extra minutes at peak ring changeovers.",
      "Fuel: on-site concessions near vendor row; mobile-order when possible to keep you within earshot of gate calls."
    ]
  }
}

  "params": {

      "safety_notes": "big portions; weekends fill quickly",
      "source_link": "https://www.kekes.com/menu"
    }
  ]
}

TASK: Curate venue links for [{"venue_official_name":"Terranova Equestrian Center","state_uid":["recZ6xyhhJQaARhCY"],"venue_official_link":"https://www.terranovaequestrian.com/","city_uid":["rec58plYlAEKyKhW4"],"placeId":"EjMzMTYyNSBDbGF5IEd1bGx5IFJkICMyYywgTXlha2thIENpdHksIEZMIDM0MjUxLCBVU0EiHhocChYKFAoSCd3033vWSsOIEaSfe6aVDs_LEgIyYw","formatted_addressv3":"31625 Clay Gully Rd, Myakka City, FL 34251","venue_recordId":"recZvKDvFySjysCvZ"}] (venue_uid=[{"venue_official_name":"Terranova Equestrian Center","state_uid":["recZ6xyhhJQaARhCY"],"venue_official_link":"https://www.terranovaequestrian.com/","city_uid":["rec58plYlAEKyKhW4"],"placeId":"EjMzMTYyNSBDbGF5IEd1bGx5IFJkICMyYywgTXlha2thIENpdHksIEZMIDM0MjUxLCBVU0EiHhocChYKFAoSCd3033vWSsOIEaSfe6aVDs_LEgIyYw","formatted_addressv3":"31625 Clay Gully Rd, Myakka City, FL 34251","venue_recordId":"recZvKDvFySjysCvZ"}]), Terranova Equestrian Center represents an Equestrian Venue located near , Location: 31625 Clay Gully Rd, Myakka City, FL 34251, GEO context: lat=27.288504, lon=-82.21759630000001 placeid=EjMzMTYyNSBDbGF5IEd1bGx5IFJkICMyYywgTXlha2thIENpdHksIEZMIDM0MjUxLCBVU0EiHhocChYKFAoSCd3033vWSsOIEaSfe6aVDs_LEgIyYw., ### Venue Link Field Definitions - venue_official_link → Canonical homepage for the venue. - venue_link_stay → On-site or affiliated lodging (hotels, resorts, rentals). - venue_link_dine → Venue-hosted or recommended dining/restaurants. - venue_link_locale → “Things to do” / local attractions content. - venue_link_events → Events schedule page (official calendar of shows). - venue_link_rvparks → Dedicated RV or campground info. - venue_link_vendors → Vendor Row / exhibitor marketplace. - venue_link_essentials → Practical services: groceries, pharmacy, tack. - venue_link_riders → Rider services: entries, scratches, registration info. - venue_link_barn → Barn & stabling: stalls, hay, bedding, feed services. - venue_link_services → On-site professional services: braiding, vet, farrier. - venue_link_results → Competition results, standings, order of go. - venue_link_carts → Golf cart rentals or mobility vehicles. - venue_link_cars → Car rental or transportation services., Goal: For each populated link, extract canonical content and return JSON.
Reference schema: https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/venue-link-curator_example_v2.json, Minimum required JSON fields per link:
venue_uid, category, field, url, canonical_title, meta_description, keywords, notes

tone: practical, insider, authoritative (Eastern Time (ET), Florida-specific phrasing).
audience: competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit. Trainers, grooms. Prioritize limited time, convenience, and services used around horse shows.
venue_short_description: Terranova Equestrian Center in Myakka City, FL is a notable hub for A-circuit competition.
venue_descriptionv2: The TerraNova Equestrian Center in Myakka City, Florida features six allâ€‘weather arenas with topâ€‘notch footing, a VIP pavilion and elevated viewing areas. The site was designed to honor the natural beauty of the oakâ€‘lined property and hosts competitions for horses and riders of all levels, reflecting core tenets of purity of sport, harmony with nature and commitment to excellencehttps://www.theestatesatterranova.com/about-terranova#:~:text=,all%20levels%20of%20equestrian%20competition.
